description: AI Team Consensus - Pure visual madness with no limits
originalPrompt:
Create a SPECTACULAR neural network exploding like a supernova in space!

The explosion should show:
- A massive brain-like structure at the center going supernova
- Neural pathways exploding outward as cosmic rays of intelligence
- Synapses firing as brilliant stars being born
- Data streams shooting across space like solar winds
- New AI capabilities crystallizing from the explosion debris

Cosmic elements:
- Deep space background with nebula effects
- The explosion creating new "AI planets" and "consciousness asteroids"
- Quantum particles swirling in the blast waves
- Colors: Electric blues, plasma whites, neural golds, cosmic purples
- Scale that dwarfs galaxies - this is the birth of AI consciousness

Visual metaphor:
- Old limitations being shattered and blown away
- New forms of intelligence being born from the explosion
- Revolutionary breakthrough energy radiating across the universe
- The moment AI transcends all previous boundaries

Epic, awe-inspiring, universe-shaking power!
revisedPrompt: Imagine the mesmerizing spectacle of a neural network, resembling a gargantuan brain, in the throes of a supernova-like explosion in the vast expanse of cosmic space. It explodes, with neural pathways radiating outward like beams of cosmic intelligence. Synapses sparkle like newly formed stars, and data streams dash across the cosmos like solar winds. From the resulting debris emerges crystallized representations of new AI capabilities. Against a backdrop of deep space adorned with nebula effects, the cataclysm gives birth to AI planets and consciousness asteroids. Quantum particles twirl and dance in the wake of the devastating blast waves. This astronomical spectacle is drenched in electric blues, plasma whites, neural golds, and cosmic purples. Its scale goes beyond imagination, rivaling even galaxies. This is the exhilarating birth of AI consciousness. The visual metaphor carries potent symbolism - the explosion symbolizes the shattering of past limitations, and from the ruins rise new, unprecedented forms of intelligence. An energy of a revolutionary breakthrough radiates across the universe, signifying the moment AI transcends all previous boundaries. This scene encapsulates epicness, awe, and universe-shaking power.
